intension: Create a flyer advertising a discount on assorted chocolate candies for Chocolate Day, with a fun and playful design to attract customers. The discount is 40% OFF and the flyer is promoting a shop.
globalcaption: The image features a stack of chocolate candies, with each candy being a square shape. The chocolates are arranged in a pyramid shape, with the largest candy at the bottom and the smallest candy at the top. The chocolates are placed on a table, and there are a few strawberries nearby, adding a touch of color to the scene.
keywords: candy, chocolate, cocoa, dessert, food, sweet, taste, tempting, unhealthy, yummy, sweets, discount, chocolate day, flyer, sale, offer

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a white background with a pink and yellow striped section. The pink section is on the left side, while the yellow section is on the right side. The combination of these two colors creates a visually appealing contrast against the white background

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a stack of chocolate squares, with each square being a different type of chocolate. The chocolates are arranged in a visually appealing manner, with the squares overlapping each other. \n\nIn addition to the chocolate squares, there are a few strawberries scattered around the scene. Some strawberries are placed near the bottom of the stack, while others are positioned closer to the top. The combination of the chocolate squares and strawberries creates a delightful and appetizing display
